result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. RICHARD H WOODS

records.addlTxt: Plea/sentencing hearing on December 1, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

9:21 AM Defendant RICHARD H WOODS appeared by phone.  Attorney Brianne Eileen Patzer in court for RICHARD H WOODS.  Prosecuting attorney Christian A. Gossett in court for the State of Wisconsin. Atty Patzer advises of case status, possible consolidation with a Br 6 case.  Plea/sentencing hearing to be determined.

10:37 AM Prosecuting attorney David C. Rashid in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant RICHARD H WOODS appeared by video.  Attorney Brianne Eileen Patzer in court for RICHARD H WOODS.  Joint request to remove 8/16/22 jury trial from court's calendar and set out for plea/sentencing to allow Defendant to complete treatment.
Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for October 28, 2022 at 09:15 am.

1:33 PM Defendant RICHARD H WOODS in court with attorney Brianne Eileen Patzer.  Defendant RICHARD H WOODS in custody.  David C. Rashid appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  RICHARD H WOODS appeared by ZOOM video means with Attorney.  Information on file.  Defense acknowledges receipt of information and waives reading.  Noting a special appearance and enters a not guilty plea.  Court notes victim's rights are complied with.  Court orders bond to continue.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for August 15, 2022 at 10:30 am.  Jury trial scheduled for August 16, 2022 at 08:30 am.

09:29 AM Defendant RICHARD H WOODS in court with attorney Brianne Eileen Patzer.  Defendant RICHARD H WOODS in custody.  Amanda Lynn Folger appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  RICHARD H WOODS appeared by video means with Attorney.  Bond Continues.  The Court notes there is no victim present that wishes to make a statement.  Record closed @ 9:32.  Arraignment scheduled for June 1, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Waiver of time limits for preliminary hearing

records.addlTxt: 09:17 AM Defendant RICHARD H WOODS in court, in custody.  Anthony Prekop appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  RICHARD H WOODS appeared by video means.  Advised of rights.  DE will apply to the Public Defender.  The Court will set another FP date.  The Court notes there is no victim present that wishes to make a statement.  Bond Continues.  Record closed @ 9:19.  Further proceedings scheduled for May 23, 2022 at 09:15 am.

ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY.  NO POSSESSION OR CONSUMPTION OF ILLEGAL CONTROLLED SUBSTANCES OR DRUG PARAPHERNALIA WITHOUT A VALID PRESCRIPTION.  You shall report for fingerprinting and photos pursuant to Wis Stats 970.02(7) to room 15, lower level of the Courthouse.  Due to COVID-19 you will need to call 920-236-4906 BEFORE reporting.

08:59 AM Defendant RICHARD H WOODS in court.  Adam Joseph Levin appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Given/has complaint. Advised of charges & potential penalties.  The Court did confirm with the State that they are in compliance with Marsy's Law.  The defendant authorized the Court to send text message reminders of upcoming court hearings.  Defendant will apply for a public defender.  Record closed @ 9:02  Further proceedings scheduled for May 12, 2022 at 09:15 am.
to appear on Monday, May 02, 2022 at 8:45 am - Court Commissioner
